text.content: Finely shave lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, and slice the red spur chili.
Heat a wok (no oil). Add curry paste, stir-fry briefly, then add minced meat. Fry, scraping the bottom, until the meat is fully cooked and dry.
Stir in a pinch of sugar, then add the shaved lemongrass and most of the kaffir lime leaves. Continue stir-frying until the mixture is very dry. Just before finishing, add the sliced red spur chili.
Transfer the Khua Kling to a serving dish. Garnish with the remaining kaffir lime leaves and sliced Thai bird chilies.
